comments:
Driver: RC2
Java : Sun Java 1.3.1_07
OS: Solaris
Language: ja_JP

I got errors in the .log file during launching the WB with NLS language 
package, and WB did not launch.

Steps
1. Extract the eclipse-SDK.zip 
2. Extract the NLS Language package (eclipse-nls-SDK-2.0.x.zip) under the same
directory
3. Launch the eclipse (./eclipse -vm /......)
Then I got the error dialog and got errors in the .log file. WB startup failed.
The errors appears to come from the ui component.
Moving to SWT as this is a problem created by setText().
*** Bug 35186 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Please note that this is a VM that does not support  DBCS. Please use a 1.4.0 
or later VM.

on HP-UX you should use

java version "1.4.0.03"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.0.03-021213-19:00)
Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM (build 1.4 1.4.0.03-021213-20:20-PA_RISC2.0 PA2.0, 
mixed mode)

Taking ownership of report for now, but please follow up to indicate whether or 
not using a jre 1.4 makes this work for you.

Jeff, this is the "converter bug" that we are scared to fix for 2.1.1.  To be 
clear, this means is that Eclipse 2.1.1 will not work on Solaris J.

I've verified the fix on Eclipse 3.0.
Yasuda-san, please close this pr. thanks.
Fuse-san, thank you for verifying this.
